title: Motion Capture Biomechanics Software
description: Developed a computer vision software to analyze a real-time video input for landmark detection, hand tracking, and identification of body angles

title: 3D Spatial Recognition Software
description: An embedded system architecture project made to collect and reconstruct spatial dimensions to develop a 3D digital model rendering of any room or hallway

title: Text to Braille Converter
description: This was a school-based project made for the visually impaired so that any external image can be taken by the device and instantaneously turn the image into braille lettering
